reviews.review_title: Good convenient location for travellers and comfortable stylish accommodation.
reviews.positive_text: Great location close to the main roads linking South Brittany and Roscoff. Helpful staff including the restaurant manager who allowed us to have breakfast even though we arrived after 10.00am. The receptionist having informed us upon arrival that it opened till 11.00am.

reviews.positive_text: La colazione √® ottima la stanza √® grande e confortevole

Tutto! Stanza ampia e ben isolata, pulizia, gentilezza dello staff. La piscina √® aperta fino alle 20.30, quindi al nostro arrivo in tardo pomeriggio abbiamo potuto rilassarci con un bagno.
